name: Achema
goal: Achema is a leading producer of nitrogen fertilizers and chemical products in Lithuania and the Baltic states. Achema is mainly engaged in nitrogen fertilizer, fertilizer blends, liquid fertilizer, ammonia, nitric acid, formalin, urea formaldehyde - melamine resin, industrial gas, and aluminium sulphate solution production.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Ongoing trade defense activities, energy security policy, agriculture policy change, enviromental policies.
